Posts.Content: Jun 20, 2009 03:10AM Dollyd wrote: Hi LynnW Thank you. You put words to how it really feels. I have a sister in law that thinks I had a bad flu and now its all better. She won't ask me how I am but will say "your fine now".  I reached my target I set 7 years ago when dx with mets, my daughter was 18 last week. Next target is for her College Graduation in 4 years. Can anyone  tell me what an enlarged superclavicular node is? I had to collect my last oncology report and made the mistake of reading it ------ bad idea.  Dollyd
Posts.Title: Scans say stable. I say big deal. LynnW Dollyd

Posts.Content: Jun 21, 2009 03:53AM Dollyd wrote: Dear Saint, Thank you. I can't believe my oncg. didn't refer to it. Did he read the report? I'm tired chasing men around to do their jobs properly.   Dollyd
